languages.text: {n}Главное, что бросается в глаза в этом месте — беспорядок в стенных панелях рядом с дверью. На них видны многочисленные царапины, по пять в ряд, похожие на следы ногтей. Часть панелей еле держится, тут и там за ними искрят и потрескивают поврежденные провода.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Главное, что бросается в глаза в этом месте — беспорядок в стенных панелях рядом с дверью. На них видны многочисленные царапины, по пять в ряд, похожие на следы ногтей. Часть панелей еле держится, тут и там за ними искрят и потрескивают поврежденные провода.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The main thing that catches your eye about this place is the state of the wall panels by the door. They bear numerous scratches, five in a row, resembling claw marks. Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment; here and there you see the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Главное, что бросается в глаза в этом месте — беспорядок в стенных панелях рядом с дверью. На них видны многочисленные царапины, по пять в ряд, похожие на следы ногтей. Часть панелей еле держится, тут и там за ними искрят и потрескивают поврежденные провода.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The main thing you notice about this place is the state of the wall panels by the door. They bear numerous scratches, five in a row, resembling claw marks. Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment, and you catch the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}

Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment, and you catch the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}

Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment; here and there you see the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}

{n}The main thing that catches your eye about this place is the state of the wall panels by the door. They bear numerous scratches, five in a row, resembling claw marks. Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment; here and there you see the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}门边墙板的情况一下子就吸引了你的注意力。墙板上有许多条划痕，五条划痕连在一起，像是爪子留下来的痕迹。部分墙板看起来仿佛随时都会掉下来。墙板后面到处都能看到损坏的电线，偶尔还能看到电火花，听到噼里啪啦的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The main thing that catches your eye about this place is the state of the wall panels by the door. They bear numerous scratches, five in a row, resembling claw marks. Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment; here and there you see the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}门边墙板的情况一下子就吸引了你的注意力。墙板上有许多条划痕，五条划痕连在一起，像是爪子留下来的痕迹。部分墙板看起来仿佛随时都会掉下来。墙板后面到处都能看到损坏的电线，偶尔还能看到电火花，听到噼里啪啦的声音。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lo que más te llama la atención es el estado de los paneles de la pared junto a la puerta. Tienen numerosas marcas, cinco seguidas, que parecen haber sido dejadas por garras. Algunos de los paneles parecen estar a punto de caerse. Aquí y allí ves chispazos ocasionales, acompañados del crepitar de los cables que hay detrás.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The main thing that catches your eye about this place is the state of the wall panels by the door. They bear numerous scratches, five in a row, resembling claw marks. Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment; here and there you see the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lo que más te llama la atención es el estado de los paneles de la pared junto a la puerta. Tienen numerosas marcas, cinco seguidas, que parecen haber sido dejadas por garras. Algunos de los paneles parecen estar a punto de caerse. Aquí y allí ves chispazos ocasionales, acompañados del crepitar de los cables que hay detrás.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この場所で一番気になるのは扉横の壁パネルの状態だ。立て続けに5回、爪のようなもので刻まれたように、いくつもの切り傷ができている。今にも落ちそうなパネルもあり、あちらこちらで裏面の痛んだワイヤーから時折火花が散ってパチパチと音を立てている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The main thing that catches your eye about this place is the state of the wall panels by the door. They bear numerous scratches, five in a row, resembling claw marks. Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment; here and there you see the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この場所で一番気になるのは扉横の壁パネルの状態だ。立て続けに5回、爪のようなもので刻まれたように、いくつもの切り傷ができている。今にも落ちそうなパネルもあり、あちらこちらで裏面の痛んだワイヤーから時折火花が散ってパチパチと音を立てている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Was an diesem Ort sofort deine Aufmerksamkeit erregt, ist der Zustand der Wandelemente bei der Tür. Sie weisen zahlreiche Kratzer auf, in Fünferreihen, wie von Klauen. Einige der Elemente sehen aus, als könnten sie jeden Moment abfallen. Hie und da erblickst du dahinter einzelne Funken und hörst das Knistern beschädigter Kabel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The main thing that catches your eye about this place is the state of the wall panels by the door. They bear numerous scratches, five in a row, resembling claw marks. Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment; here and there you see the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Was an diesem Ort sofort deine Aufmerksamkeit erregt, ist der Zustand der Wandelemente bei der Tür. Sie weisen zahlreiche Kratzer auf, in Fünferreihen, wie von Klauen. Einige der Elemente sehen aus, als könnten sie jeden Moment abfallen. Hie und da erblickst du dahinter einzelne Funken und hörst das Knistern beschädigter Kabel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre regard est aussitôt attiré par les nombreuses éraflures défigurant les cloisons, de part et d'autre de la porte. Regroupées cinq par cinq, elles vous font penser à des traces de griffes. Certains panneaux menacent de s'effondrer à tout instant, et vous percevez les étincelles et crépitements caractéristiques de câbles endommagés, juste derrière le revêtement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The main thing that catches your eye about this place is the state of the wall panels by the door. They bear numerous scratches, five in a row, resembling claw marks. Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment; here and there you see the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre regard est aussitôt attiré par les nombreuses éraflures défigurant les cloisons, de part et d'autre de la porte. Regroupées cinq par cinq, elles vous font penser à des traces de griffes. Certains panneaux menacent de s'effondrer à tout instant, et vous percevez les étincelles et crépitements caractéristiques de câbles endommagés, juste derrière le revêtement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu mekâna ilişkin gözüne çarpan en önemli husus, kapının yanındaki duvar panellerinin hâli oluyor. Duvar panelleri, pençe izlerini andıran beşerli çiziklerle kaplı. Panellerden bazıları düşmek üzereymiş gibi duruyor. Arkalarındaki hasarlı kabloları ve ara ara çıkardıkları kıvılcımları görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The main thing that catches your eye about this place is the state of the wall panels by the door. They bear numerous scratches, five in a row, resembling claw marks. Some of the panels look like they could fall off at any moment; here and there you see the occasional sparks and crackling of the damaged wires behind them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu mekâna ilişkin gözüne çarpan en önemli husus, kapının yanındaki duvar panellerinin hâli oluyor. Duvar panelleri, pençe izlerini andıran beşerli çiziklerle kaplı. Panellerden bazıları düşmek üzereymiş gibi duruyor. Arkalarındaki hasarlı kabloları ve ara ara çıkardıkları kıvılcımları görüyorsun.{/n}
